subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal won his fourth straight Barcelona Open title with a 6-1, 4-6, 6-1 victory over second-seeded David Ferrer. Nadal’s 21st straight win at the tournament improved his record to 20-1 in clay-court finals, including 4-0 at Barcelona. The second-ranked Nadal has won 103 of his last 104 matches on clay. Nadal, the three-time French Open champion, will go for a fourth straight Masters Series title in Rome, starting Monday.
